problem_text_cn: 如图,在△ABC中,DE∥BC,DE分别与AB、AC相交于点D、E,若AD=4,AB=6,则DE:BC的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, DE ∥ BC, DE intersects AB and AC at points D and E respectively. If AD = N_0, AB = N_1, then the value of DE:BC is ()
raw_comment: 该题主要考查了相似三角形的判定及其性质及其应用问题；直接运用相似三角形的判定及其性质即可解决问题．
